name: Wave Masters - tribes wars
description:
Shamans compete on waves of power to get a fame for the irtribes.

Wave Masters - tribes wars is two players party game in which players try to shot three goals per round. Each round lasts about 10 seconds. The only form of defense is attack.

Creators:

Game was created on Global Game Jam 2017 by:

  • Anna Stepaniuk - management and graphic magician
  • Stanisław Skulimowski - Construct 2 master
  • Damian Zwoliński - virtuoso

also thanks to Bartłomiej Grzywaczewski for physics tips ;)

Technology Notes:

There was used manual graphic photos of watercolors with wax and digital painting. Animations are in stop motion technique from the paintings and vector puppet pin animation of meshes in AE, some movements are of course also programmed (movements of heads or loading mana).
